title: What is the interpretation of seeing a stranger in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadota website provides you with a complete interpretation of seeing a stranger in a dream, and this vision indicates one of the visions that many people have had. He sees her in her sleep. It is normal for a person to see a strange and unrealistic dream in his sleep, which leads to anxiety and psychological discomfort. We have collected for you, our dear ones, all the interpretations from books on the interpretation of dreams and visions. Here, dear followers, we will provide you with a dream about a foreigner, a married person, a pregnant woman, and a man. Interpretation of seeing a stranger in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing a stranger in a dream completely indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s problems, but it indicates revenge. Also, seeing a stranger offering meat Sweet for the former indicates the abundance of sustenance that the dreamer will soon receive in his next life. Also, seeing a complete stranger in the dream indicates that some disturbances will occur in the dreamer’s life and also indicates escaping from diseases. Interpretation of seeing a stranger in a dream full of a woman’s bowlIf the girl sees In her dream of seeing a bowl with a stranger, this indicates her closeness to that person, and God knows best. Also, seeing a stranger attacking a girl indicates that the girl is being deceived by the people in her life. Also, to see a stranger in a dream filled with a bowling pin means that trouble Worries will go away and indicate happiness and good news. Also, seeing a strange woman in a girl’s dream proposing to her means great success and distinction in her life. Complete interpretation of a strange dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is arguing with a stranger, this indicates the collapse of her worries and the multiplicity of disagreements. Also, seeing a complete stranger in a dream indicates the collapse of her worries and problems between her husband and their good relationship. Also, seeing an unknown person in a dream filled with a married woman indicates the blows that the woman has suffered in her life, and a lot of anxiety and fear. The interpretation of seeing a stranger in a dream is complete. For a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a complete stranger in a dream, then she sees a complete stranger in the dream, then this vision indicates the difficulty of childbirth and therefore the ease of it occurring, and God knows best. Also, seeing a complete stranger in a dream indicates that a pregnant woman is hugging her and this shows confirmation, but it shows betrayal. Her husband. Interpretation of seeing a complete stranger in a dream for a man. If a man sees a stranger in his dream, this means good news that will soon herald a good marriage, and God knows best. Also, dreaming of a complete stranger doing what a fortune teller does indicates the misfortune of the fortuneteller who will be imprisoned for a long time. Seeing a complete stranger in a dream It may mean that the dreamer will join a new job from his friends' side and it also indicates good work and strength. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing weight loss in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing losing weight in a dream symbolizes bad luck and poverty. It is said that dreaming of losing weight indicates misfortune and disaster and that seeing a person who has become emaciated in a dream indicates his need for help in escaping his problems. The interpretation of a dream about losing weight varies depending on the condition of the dreamer and the details of the vision. Interpretation of losing weight in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing weight loss in a dream means poverty, the disappearance of blessings and goodness, and a lack of knowledge if followed by fatigue and exhaustion. And whoever sees that his weight suddenly decreases in a dream, he will fall into... Distress and calamity. Losing weight in a dream for a single woman means feeling sadness and pain, and losing weight in a dream for a married woman indicates her many fears and responsibilities. Modern dream interpreters said that seeing weight loss in a dream indicates anxiety that befalls the dreamer, no matter how low his weight is, this may indicate Lack of money and contentment, and seeing death from excessive thinness in a dream, means that he has fallen into misfortunes and misfortunes, and whoever sees that he has lost weight after excessive weight. Being fat in a dream derives goodness and pleasure. Whoever sees that she is taking diet pills in a dream, she will obtain happiness and pleasure provided that her body is fit and beautiful in the dream. Dreaming of being emaciated with sadness indicates illness and psychological fatigue in reality, and whoever sees a fat man suddenly losing weight in a dream, this Evidence of the poor conditions of the people and the drought that is sweeping the country. Whoever sees the king or ruler losing weight in a dream, then he will decline in his religion or persecute the people, and the lack of weight of children in the dream is evidence of worry and distress. And God knows best. Interpretation of weight in a dream. Measuring weight in a dream is evidence of repaying a debt and fulfilling an oath. Perhaps it indicates the fortuneteller’s attempt to improve his life for the better. Whoever sees that he is measuring his weight and it does not change in a dream, then he is fixed in his positions, and whoever sees that he is measuring his weight and it increases. In a dream, he takes food and money from where he does not know, but dreaming of losing weight when measuring it indicates something harmful or unpleasant that happens to the pioneer. Seeing yourself standing on a scale in a dream indicates faith and justice in speech and seeing yourself measuring weight after walking in a dream means gaining Get what you want after working hard and suffering for it. Whoever sees himself measuring his weight after exercising in a dream will overcome obstacles and challenges. Weighing in the pharmacy in a dream indicates solving accumulated problems, and whoever sees himself weighing himself at home in a dream seeks to ensure a stable and balanced life, and God knows best. Seeing someone who has become thin in Seeing a person who has become emaciated in a dream indicates failure to perform his acts of worship, and slander denotes avarice and avarice, and seeing someone you know has become emaciated in a dream denotes the narrowness of his circumstances and the greatness of his concerns. Seeing a emaciated ruler in a dream denotes the poor conditions of the country and seeing a scholar or sheikh emaciated in a dream. The dream indicates the spread of ignorance and misguidance. Seeing a dead person weak in a dream indicates his need for prayers and charity. Seeing a father thin in a dream means that he bears responsibilities beyond his capacity, while seeing

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing verses on the Day of Resurrection in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream: The dreams that we see in our dreams are many and different. They convey to the dreamer many signs and signs, whether these signs are good or bad for the dreamer. There are many interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and others. Superior interpreters, as interpreters have interpreted many visions and dreams to know their goodness or evil, and in this we discover the interpretation of a dream about seeing signs of the Day of Resurrection that have multiple connotations related to them. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection with family for a single woman. There are many signs and signs that are indicated by the different visions that the dreamer sees. In Al-Manan, the interpretation of a dream about seeing signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream is one of the dreams that has multiple related connotations. For her, which depends on the nature of the vision and her body, and there are many connotations related to the interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection with the family for an unmarried woman in a dream, which is represented by the following: There are many visions related to the vision of the Day of Resurrection, and it is one of the visions that many people will see. If a girl sees If a woman is not married on the Day of Resurrection, and her family is with her, this indicates the sins that she commits. Regardless of the sins that anger God Almighty and the abhorrent deeds she did in her life. Because this vision is an invitation to return and repent to God Almighty, in addition to staying away from everything that the dreamer commits. Sins and transgressions will destroy them in this world and the hereafter. See also: Interpretation of a dream that says “God is sufficient, and He is the best disposer of affairs” in the dream of a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and seeking forgiveness for a married woman. There are many dreams that a married woman sees in a dream, and these visions have signs Different. The interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and asking for forgiveness for a married woman is represented by each of the following indicators: There are many visions associated with seeing verses on the Day of Resurrection in a dream for a married woman. As this vision indicates many good signs for a married woman, which depends on the appearance of the dream. In addition to what This woman does good deeds and good deeds, and restores her among the people in a time of strife. Ibn Sirin also explained in his interpretation of the vision on the Day of Resurrection for a married woman that if that woman does not feel fear, then this is evidence of her husband’s great love for her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a rooster in A dream for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing verses on the Day of Resurrection in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman sees many visions that may cause her anxiety or may bring her many tidings that make her happy. The interpretation of a dream about seeing signs of Resurrection is among the dreams that indicate many signs and signals that It depends on the form and nature of the dream and seeing the signs of the Day of Resurrection. There are many interpretations related to a pregnant woman seeing the signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream, which have different meanings. When a pregnant woman sees the Day of Resurrection and feels fear, this indicates the problems she faces. In addition to the crises that affect her health. During pregnancy, which you experience

title: Cleaver in a dream: Interpretation of seeing a knife in a dream of an unmarried woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Ladies and gentlemen, hello and welcome. Our meeting focuses on seeing knives and noses in a dream. Through this article, we learn about everything that was said about seeing a knife in a dream according to the Islamic and Sunni approach (Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi), and then we learn about the interpretation of seeing a knife with a Western approach or according to the Western approach. To the Western analytical program (the school of analytical psychology) according to what Carl Gustav Jung mentioned in his book (Dreams). Interpretation of a knife in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The sculptor in a dream is a strong, impenetrable person who cuts off disputes and separates truth from lies, and in some interpretations The thief in visions is a strict and just ruler. Interpretation of the knife in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says in his interpretation that seeing a knife in a dream differentiates between the easiest and most difficult things, and whoever sees in the dream fights with it, then separates people. The knife in the dream according to the analysis of Carl Gustav Jung. Carl Gustav believes Jung stated that sharp tools such as knives or knives in a dream express the dreamer's pride in the quality or advantage of power that he possesses within him, and the appearance of a knife in a dream is caused by the dreamer's hidden feeling of need for violence. The violent self, which is not perceived consciously or vigilantly, and its owner is often exaggerated or exaggerated in pretending to be calm or civilized, but in reality it is vulnerable to revenge and cruelty. The knife in the dream of an unmarried girl. The girl who sees in her dream that she is cutting meat or breaking bones with a large cleaver or Sharp, then in vigilance she prepares to solve an important issue in her life, and her decision may sometimes be difficult and painful. In matters related to engagement and marriage, the appearance of a knife in a woman’s dream sometimes indicates boldness and a superior ability to set goals and achieve them. A good indicator and symbol of the psychological and mental strength that a girl has. The knife in a dream of a married woman. A married woman sees in her dream that she is holding in her hand a large or sharp knife, in reality she controls things in a way that makes her life and the life of her family go successfully, as the woman sometimes shows extreme strictness in her dealings and behavior . The guards have superior abilities and sharp intelligence and can achieve anything they desire. The balaka sometimes in a married woman’s dream expresses her husband with a nervous or obnoxious nature, but in the end he is a husband with a correct opinion and a strict approach to dealing with the vicissitudes of life, and thus expresses security and calm. Like a knife. A knife in a pregnant woman’s dream. A blood-stained knife in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates safety regarding the course of pregnancy and the condition of the fetus. Tableware may indicate the presence of a male baby. In visions, bandits remain a very positive symbol for both men and women.Negative symbols of seeing a knife in visionsIt is not good in visions to break a knife or use it as a weapon to confront someone close, because this represents enmity and hostility, and it is not good in visions to cut off human heads with knives, because This represents deception and deception. unfairness. Or injustice and slander. Positive symbols of seeing a knife in a dream is praised in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from drowning

preview.html: There are many people who want to drown in their dreams and the fear and panic that it carries, but the interpretation of this is due to the nature of the dream and the nature of the seer, and through the following lines we will get to know it, so stay with us. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from drowning in a dream If someone sees in a dream that he is drowning and one of his relatives comes to him and saves him. This may be evidence that this person will stand by him and support him with money. If someone sees in a dream that he is drowning but his colleague saves him from this drowning. This may be an indication of his colleague standing by him. It also suggests that you provide him with professional advice that helps him overcome his problems easily. If someone sees in a dream that he is drowning, but he missed the goal, and in reality they were envious of him. It states that envy will disappear from his life, as it indicates that he will live happy and calm days, God willing. When someone dreams that he is drowning, he is in the sea and feels fear, but he could not escape. This is evidence of his liberation from the sins and transgressions that he committed, God willing. If a person suffering from debt sees that he has escaped from Drowning. This is an indication that he will be freed from these debts, and it also shows that he will have a lot of food and money, God willing. When a person sees in a dream that he is drowning in the raging sea, he was able to escape from it. It may be an indication of his ability to save himself from the difficult dangers he faces. When a captive saw in her dream that she was drowning but was able to escape death. This means that he will be released from prison in the near future. When a single man sees in his dream that he escapes from drowning. This may be a sign of his marriage to a righteous woman who will love him and make him happy. If a person sees himself drowning in the river, he will be able to survive. This may mean that she needs a strong and powerful person and that she will be able to get it easily. If a person sees in his dream that one is drowning in the sea and the waves surround him and submerge him, but he was able to survive. In this happy news that he can overcome the problems he is going through. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of a dream of drowning in the sea and getting out of it The good interpretation of seeing salvation from drowning in a dream When a man sees himself in the sea, diving. This may mean that he will reach high positions in the world , because it indicates that he will accompany the rich. When one sees in a dream that he is drowning in the sea, but he tried to stay alive. This may be an indication that he will obtain a share of power and a great position. When a person sees in a dream that he is waving his arm and leg and diving in an attempt to stay alive. This is an indication that he will have a lot of wealth and money in the near future. If one sees that he is wearing green clothes and drowning but he tried to escape and got out of the water. This may be a sign that the dreamer has reached his senses and righteousness after indulging in false worldly desires. Whoever sees in a dream that he is drowning in the sea, he is characterized by justice and closeness to God. It indicates that he is drowning in the bliss of the world and righteousness, and it also indicates the money that he will obtain

title: Interpretation of the dream of traveling to France in a dream according to the most famous interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a trip to France in a dream by the most famous interpreters, where a trip to France in particular is one of the dreams permeated by ambiguity. Or divorced, and today through the lines of our article we will get to know each other.Interpretation of the dream of traveling to France in a dream.Interpretation of the dream of traveling to France in a dreamTravel is one of the most important dreams that many people dream of, whether in a state of wakefulness or in a dream, because it has many different goals, whether for study. Or to work or to shape the future and achieve some ambitions and dreams. . As follows: Many interpreters have confirmed that traveling by plane in a dream is one of the clearest signs that the dreamer will assume a position or authority in the near future on a professional level. A trip to France in particular shows the financial prosperity in which the dreamer lives and that this situation will continue to accompany him. For a long time. If the dreamer is an unmarried girl, this indicates her trip to France to marry a prominent man with his standing in society. As for a married woman who travels to France with her husband, or moves from one house to another, this is an indication that she will live in a place Better than the one you currently live in. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a motorcycle in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to France on a ship. The interpretation of a dream varies from one person to another, depending on the situation in which the dreamer is dreaming, and there are many details present in the dream that affect its interpretation, so it is The interpretation of the boat trip is as follows: If the interpreter has a lot of problems at the moment, this is an indication that he will get rid of all these problems, but it takes some time. Also, traveling to France by ship in a dream indicates a delay in achieving the dreams and aspirations that he dreams about. The dreamer. Seeing a trip to France by ship indicates the change that will happen to the dreamer in the social sphere in the near future. If the dreamer is suffering from health problems, this is an indication that he will soon get rid of these problems and recover quickly for him. Interpretation of seeing traveling to France in a dream According to Ibn Sirin, there are many scholars and interpreters who resort mainly to the interpretation of dreams, and one of the most important of these translators is Ibn Sirin, who published many books on the interpretation of dreams, so that he could interpret the vision of the trip to France. As follows: It is believed that it indicates that the dreamer hears many happy dreams related to matters of marriage and intercourse in the event that he is single. But if the dreamer gets married, this indicates that he will soon have a child. If the dreamer has some rivalries and enmities that accompany him at the present time, This dream indicates that he will get rid of these enemies once and for all. Ibn Sirin claims that the trip to France in general is one of the signs that indicate many positive changes that await the dreamer in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of a dream about limping in a dream for women Unmarried women’s interpretation of the vision of traveling to France in a dream

title: Interpretation of the preacher’s dream, the meaning of engagement in a dream

preview.html: Meanings of engagement in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married woman and a single young man. Either the single girl’s engagement to an unknown or well-known person, or a former fiancé and his fiancé. A lover wears an engagement dress, buys a ring, dances at the party, and more according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing engagement in a dream. With regard to engagement, one of these indications is that engagement in a dream is an indication that the person will achieve what he wants, and this happens if he dreams that he is engaged to a beautiful girl he knows, and the person will achieve this from. He wants beautiful things in life. For example, if someone is looking for a job and is always preparing for it, and one day he sees in his dream that he is proposing to a girl he knows, and this girl is beautiful and kind, and he basically wants her and is looking for her, this means that he He will get what he wants and will be able to succeed in this job. It was said: Whoever sees that he is proposing to a girl and wants to talk to her, if that girl represents his request, which is what he wants and seeks, then that is a sign that relief will reach him. And enjoy happiness, pleasure and joy, but if one sees in a dream a girl proposing to him, this indicates the coming of comfort and the departure and disappearance of tension. Engagement If young people dream that they are engaged, this means that they will not receive special admiration. A dream about breaking off an engagement indicates that a quick and reckless action in an important matter, or Disappointments, may follow this dream. The dream is a sign of the dreamer's thoughts about his family life and marriage and his thoughts about an organized life, and for this reason he creates the marital nest because of his desire to experience these beautiful feelings. It expresses the experience of some beautiful, good and good developments and an increase in his share in professional life And the private, and the door to wealth opens for him. You dream that you are engaged in a dream, then this dream indicates sudden and positive events and the dreamer will begin to live a more comfortable and beautiful life and will face some events that will make him a happy person. By seeing that you are engaged to someone in the dream, many events will occur in The dreamer's life will make you happy and you will feel comfortable, and the dreamer will feel like a light person after getting rid of his worries. When seeing someone's engagement in a dream, some things will happen in the dreamer's life that will make him happy and he will get news from the people he loves that will make him feel comfortable. When seeing a friend's engagement in a dream, he will witness his This vision represents the success of the friend he sees in the dream, and the friend’s life will develop well and he will be a happy person. When you see your brother’s engagement in a dream, your brother will make some decisions regarding his future and life, and you will take some steps and achieve your goals. You will get a lot of help from your brother and you will notice great support from him. Seeing the engagement of your old lover in a dream, the dreamer will meet his girlfriend and talk about the events and situations that happened in his life. Being engaged in a dream indicates that the person who sees his engagement in the dream will experience an organized life. It will be an assistant for some other sex. The dreamer will achieve an organized life. He will be a successful man in his professional life. And as a result

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna for a single woman in a Nabulsi dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about henna for a single woman in a Nabulsi dream for fun and joy, and also to see henna in a dream, has a set of interpretations and interpretations that differed from one person to another, in addition to the location of the henna and its inscription, and in our article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about henna for a single woman in a Nabulsi dream. Interpretation of a dream Henna for a single woman in a dream Al-Nabulsi It is worth noting that interpretation scholars unanimously agreed that henna in a dream includes a group of good interpretations that express the joy and pleasure of the viewer, but it differs from one person to another according to the social status of the viewer. Except for the location of the henna that was engraved on it, and in the following lines we present to you some interpretations, including: The interpretation of an unmarried girl who saw her fingers painted with henna in a dream was an indication that the one who had the vision was good-hearted, kind-hearted, and famous for her justice. Also, if an unmarried girl dreams that she She was putting henna on her hair, so this is a sign that she will soon think about a wish. In addition, it is possible that this vision is a good sign and she will deal with the first person who proposes to her after this vision, and perhaps this vision is an indication that she will be accepted into the job she wants for For the rest. From her life it is a prestigious job. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see a kissing hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-NabulsiInterpretation of seeing henna in a dreamSeeing henna in a dream in general brings good news to God because it is an indication that the fortuneteller will enjoy happiness and joy in the near times. God Almighty, But it differs from one opinion to another according to signs and symbols. present in the dream, and in our article we present to you some of these interpretations: The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin believes that seeing henna applied to the hair in a dream is a door to happiness, pleasure, concealment, and joy, and to God Almighty repentance. We also find that the meaning of applying henna to the hair in a dream is a covering To scandals and it can indicate the arrival of joy, happiness, and the loss of worries in a woman’s dream. Moreover, when you see yourself putting henna on your hands or feet in a dream, this is a strong indication of joy, happiness, and the end of worries very soon. We find that if a man or woman sees henna on The tips of his hands in a dream, this is evidence that he is a person who is praised a lot and worshiped well, and it may be an invitation to the sinner and the fickle person. He turns away from his religion in order to come and walk on the path of guidance, righteousness, and repentance to obtain the satisfaction of God Almighty, and God Almighty is in the unseen. Seeing henna in a dream for a married woman and its interpretation. The interpretation of henna in a dream for a married woman is different from that for an unmarried girl, as each of them differs in its interpretation according to the connotations and symbols present in the dream and differs. Also according to the social status of the viewer, and about these. Interpretations: The sign of a married woman seeing that she does not want to put henna on her hair in a dream is evidence that there are problems between her and her husband, and the vision shows that she does not feel loved or respected because of that. From his mistreatment and cruelty towards her. In addition

title: Interpretation of a dream about the veil by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: If the niqab is beautiful, there will be many good ones, even if it is torn. The dreamer sees some crises and difficulties unless he finds good. And if the dreamer sees that he is buying a new veil. Here it indicates that he will have something important in his life and that he will lose the niqab in a dream. Negligence appears in life. Interpretation of seeing the niqab in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried woman saw in a dream that she saw many colors of the niqab, and she wanted to buy it in the dream, and she was very happy with it. This indicates that this single woman will see a lot of goodness and nourishment in her life, Which will make her very happy, God willing. Likewise, seeing an unmarried girl wearing a torn niqab in a dream, and its shape was very bad, and she could not change it in the dream. Here the meaning appears that this dreaming single girl will face bad things in her life. But with her closeness to God The Almighty, He will eliminate her in no time. What if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is tearing the veil and falling apart, and does not want to stay with her in the dream. This dream shows someone close to this person in her life. He tries to marry her or propose to her and she refuses, but This person is good and suitable for her. See also: Interpretation of seeing the niqab in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing the niqab in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband was wearing a niqab for her in a dream, and she was very happy with him and how he looked in the dream. The meaning may mean that this married woman She will live in abundance and prosperity. And the food will be with her husband at this time, God willing. If a married woman sees in a dream that she was looking for the niqab in many places and did not find it, and she was very sad in the dream. This indicates that this dreamer will see some bad and not good things in her life. During this time, God is Most High and Most Knowing. A married woman describes the hijab in many shapes and colors in a dream. She was selling it while feeling very happy in the dream. It appears here that this dreamer is looking for food and money in her life. And God Almighty will make it very easy, God willing. Interpretation of a vision The niqab in a dream for a divorced woman indicates that the divorced woman saw a man whom she did not know before, and he gave her the niqab in a dream. She looked beautiful in the dream and was happy with it. Here the dream indicates her close marriage to a good and righteous person in her life. He will try to get her out of all the problems she is exposed to. And the vision A divorced woman whose ex-husband was giving her a torn niqab in a dream, and the niqab she had before in her life. The dream here indicates that there are some problems between this dreamer and her ex-husband, and that she is suffering from this matter a lot, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream trying to find places She sells the niqab. But he did not find them in the dream and was sad. The meaning here indicates that this divorced woman will face some crises in her life. During this period, it will bother her a lot in life. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a colored veil in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the niqab in a dream for a man and its meaning if The dreamer saw in a dream that he was

title: Demanding ransom in a dream and interpretation of the dream about paying the ransom

preview.html: Seeing ransom in a dream symbolizes paying taxes, expenses, and damages, and whoever sees himself asking for ransom in a dream, this indicates trespassing on the property of others, and seeing a kidnapper demanding ransom in a dream indicates that there is a person who wants to harm the dreamer and hurt him, and seeing paying ransom in a dream indicates Submission to enemies. Only God knows. Interpretation of ransom in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing ransom in a dream by paying taxes and sudden expenses. Whoever sees that he is being ransomed in a dream, this means that he is going through difficulties, crises, and material losses. Avoiding paying the ransom in a dream shows escaping from adversity and seeing an inability to pay the ransom. For the kidnapper. In the dream, it shows defeat and weakness, and if you see that you are asking for help to pay a ransom in the dream, this indicates the need for help. Seeing killing and paying the ransom in a dream means regretting committing sins, and whoever sees that he is killing someone with a knife and paying a ransom in a dream, this indicates that he will retreat from his injustice, and seeing Someone shooting and paying a ransom in a dream means regretting harsh words and dreaming of killing. Injustice and paying a ransom indicates repentance and turning away from sin. Seeing a dead person paying a ransom in a dream means losing one’s inheritance. Whoever sees in a dream a dead person asking you for a ransom, this indicates his need for supplication and zakat. Gustav Miller says that if you see someone asking you for a ransom in a dream, this indicates To lose money and be subjected to deception and deception. Interpretation of requesting ransom in a dream. Asking for ransom in a dream means that you are encroaching on other people’s money and harming them. Whoever dreams of requesting ransom from his relatives in a dream, this indicates a demand for an unjust right, and seeing a request for ransom from strangers in a dream indicates acts of plunder and theft that It was committed by the dreamer, and if you see that you are demanding ransom from people you know in the dream, this indicates their harm and harm. Kidnapping a girl and demanding ransom in a dream means that you are following whims and pleasures. Ransoming a dead person in a dream means obtaining an inheritance and inheritance, and if you see yourself ransoming your deceased brother In a dream, it means that you will bear responsibility for his family. To see in a dream a ransom demand for gold indicates evil and harm to others. To see a kidnapper demanding a ransom in a dream. To see a kidnapper demanding a ransom in a dream indicates the presence of someone who wants to harm the fortuneteller and his money. Whoever sees that he is kidnapped and the kidnapper demands a ransom from His family in a dream, this indicates difficult circumstances, and seeing that he is kidnapped and the kidnapper is asking for a large ransom in a dream means calamities and misfortunes, and a dream in which he refuses to pay a ransom to the kidnapper indicates salvation from evil. Whoever sees that he received a call from the kidnapper demanding a ransom in a dream, this means that he heard Bad news, and hearing the kidnapper asking for a ransom that cannot be paid in a dream indicates his inability to act and work. Whoever sees his child being kidnapped by him and the kidnapper asking for a ransom in the dream, this indicates that he will incur great expenses and fears, and seeing the kidnapping of the little sister and the kidnapper asking for a ransom in a dream indicates On the expenses of the parents. To dream of a kidnapper demanding ransom for one of his relatives indicates the poor condition of the relatives, and if...
